title: Teenagers create an animated film
creator_credit: Larry Eikleberry, Maurice Prather and Centron Educational Films
brief_description: Documents the efforts of junior high school students in producing an animated film, “Gone with the antennas”. Shows the step-by-step process of how an animated film can be produced with a minimum of expense by a youthful group.
creator_credit_for_label: Larry Eikleberry, Maurice Prather and Centron Educational Films
